originalText.text: Dr Bissoon has been my doctor for over 12 years, he and Leslie are an amazing team whose genuine care and concern for my health has gotten me through multiple health crises over the years.  I cannot recommend highly enough, they have literally saved my quality of life (possibly even life) and health.  At 50 I still get asked for ID and feel fantastic, better than I looked and felt in my 20s or 30s.

originalText.text: Dr. Bissoon is truly one of the best doctors that have treated me. He has exceeded my expectations and I am feeling most optimal in my health. He is down to earth and listen to what I have to say and investigate any of my issue that has been stated. I highly recommend him to anyone that seeks his help.

text.text: Dr. Bissoon is truly one of the best doctors that have treated me. He has exceeded my expectations and I am feeling most optimal in my health. He is down to earth and listen to what I have to say and investigate any of my issue that has been stated. I highly recommend him to anyone that seeks his help.

originalText.text: Dr Bissoon took his time with me. It was the most thorough experience I’ve ever had with a medical professional. I felt heard and understood. Very excited to see how the prescriptions will enhance my quality of life!

text.text: Dr Bissoon took his time with me. It was the most thorough experience I’ve ever had with a medical professional. I felt heard and understood. Very excited to see how the prescriptions will enhance my quality of life!

originalText.text: Dr Bissoon and Leslie provided amazing care and attention. They properly diagnosed my mom and I and set us on a good path to re establish our health. Unlike many medical centers, Liondale Medical makes you feel cared for and you are treated as a whole person.

text.text: Dr Bissoon and Leslie provided amazing care and attention. They properly diagnosed my mom and I and set us on a good path to re establish our health. Unlike many medical centers, Liondale Medical makes you feel cared for and you are treated as a whole person.

originalText.text:
Doct Lionel B is a true genius.  I entered his office very ill, with multiple conditions (chronic infection, chronic fatigue, inflammatory problems, night sweats...) physically and morally devastated.
following a battery of blood tests accompanied by ozone therapy plus other well-targeted and precise treatment, i came back to life, dynamic and solid.
in terms of humanism , oh my God ! what about this doctor? he is a man with an ultra-sensitive heart who puts the pain of his patients first. that's what struck me most about him and his brilliant team.
the discovery of this clinic was a grace for me. whoever has a cause of lost health can take a ride there.  God bless this Dr and his staff every single day !
